ygData.msgSnippet: Two that I know of, the Jade Reaver and the Runic Carver, both scale. Reaver has an old graphic, granted, but the carver does not. Aranya Steelheart Knight of
ygData.messageBody:
Two that I know of, the Jade Reaver and the Runic Carver, both scale. Reaver
has an old graphic, granted, but the carver does not.

Aranya Steelheart
Knight of Tunare


----- Original Message -----
From: "Garramone, Michael (CCI-Las Vegas)" <garramone@...>
To: <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, September 21, 2000 12:31 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards]


>
> always was that way, but do you notice most, or all, of the new kunark
items
> not doing that or am i crazy? i.e. a sarnak battle shield is the same
size
> on a dark elf as it is on an ogre.
>
> Shada
>
